brief_title: Study Evaluating BDDRFVIII and ReFacto AF in Hemophilia A
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the relative bioavailability of ReFacto AF as compared to ReFacto, when each is administered as 2-minute bolus infusions.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Severe hemophilia A (FVIII:C < 1% at local laboratory) - Previously treated patients (PTP) with at least 250 exposure days to any factor VIII product - Age greater than or equal to 12 years\ Exclusion Criteria: - The presence of any bleeding disorder in addition to hemophilia A - Concomitant therapy with immunosuppressant drugs (e.g., intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIG), routine systemic corticosteroid use) - History of detectable factor VIII inhibitor
